temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When the user releases the sticks, the optical flow sensor is used by the autopilot to bring the vehicle to a stop.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( userreleases == sticksticloiclalflowsenso == sorusedbyautopused ) -> opotbilot == bringvehiclehicleastop )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.FHLD_BRAKE_RATE controls the desired deceleration rate when the pilot releases the sticks
2.FHLD_FILT_HZ is the filter applied to the optical flow sensor data
3.FHLD_FLOW_MAX is the optical flow sensor's maximum rate (in m/s) used when stopping
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( not ( FHLD_FLOW_MAXopticalflowsensor == smaximumrate < msuse ) and ( susedstopinrate == msusedstoping ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 4.FHLD_QUAL_MIN is the minimum flow quality used.
If the flow sensor quality falls below this value, FlowHold will act just like AltHold
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( rise ( flowsensorquality < 6 ) and FlowHoldactjust == tAltAltHoldldld )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 5.FHLD_XY_P , FHLD_XY_I , FHLD_XY_IMAX and FHLD_XY_FILT_HZ gains to tune the stopping response
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( FHLD_XY_PFHLD_ == YL_XY_IFHLD_XY_IMAX and FHLD_XY_IL_ == _XY_ILT_HZgainstunestunestst == ststopopiping )
